DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TECHNOLOGY & TELECOMMUNICATIONS
DOC.TEXT: German Company Seeks Global Mobile Phone Alliance : Deutsche Bundespost Telekom , the largest phone_company in Europe , said it is hoping to become a major player in international personal mobile communications.DeTeMobil , Telekom ' s mobile phone unit , said it will unveil a digital mobile telephone network for the greater Moscow region later this week , which it will add_to four other digital licenses and one analog license in Russia . It said it is seeking mobile telephone licenses in Europe and studying " around 20 options " in Asia . DeTeMobil wants eventually to enter the North_American market . DeTeMobil ' s parent company has set_up an alliance with Sprint Corp . and France Telecom .
